DOC.HEADLINE: RECORD RACK
DOC.TEXT: * * * Mike Henderson , " Country_Music Made Me Do It , " BMG . Henderson ' s debut is refreshingly devoid_of country cliches.A popular studio guitarist , Henderson shows his skills here as a producer , singer and , especially , writer , finding hard truth beneath the surface wit of " Fountain_of_Youth " and tapping classic honky-tonk wish fulfillment in " If the Jukebox Took Teardrops. " New albums are rated on a scale of one star ( poor ) , two stars ( fair ) , three stars ( good ) and four stars ( excellent ) . RANDY LEWIS
